title: The eligible hutment dwellers shall form their cooperative society as soon as possible and in any case not later than within three months of handing over of rehab units‘ possession to them
clause_text: The eligible hutment dwellers shall form their cooperative society as soon as possible and in any case not later than within three months of handing over of rehab units‘ possession to them.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
